    • getValidMoveViaArrows

      public static int[] getValidMoveViaArrows​(Game game, Pawn pawn, Cell restriction, java.lang.Boolean canChangePawn) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to ask to the the player where he wants to move, than calls a check method to validate the request
      Parameters:
      game - : Game
      pawn - : Pawn selected pawn
      restriction - : Cell possible restricted cells
      canChangePawn - : Boolean possibility to change the pawn (depends on the current phase)
      Returns:
      int [] resultant coordinates of the pawn after the move
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • askBuildTwice

      public static java.lang.Boolean askBuildTwice​(Player player)
      Method to ask if the player wants to build again (Hephaestus's power)
      Parameters:
      player - : Player current player that selected Hephaestus as his god
      Returns:
      Boolean (true= the player wants to build again , false= the player doesn't want to build again)

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      game - : Game
      pawn - : Pawn, active pawn
      Returns:

    • checkForValidStringInput

      protected static java.lang.String checkForValidStringInput​(java.lang.Boolean canContainNumbers, java.lang.Boolean canContainSymbols, int minLength, int maxLength, java.lang.String customErrorMessage)
      Method to get from the user a valid input: String value that is coherent with the parameters.
      Parameters:
      canContainNumbers - boolean for digits
      canContainSymbols - boolean for symbols
      minLength - min length of the word
      maxLength - max length of the word
      customErrorMessage - : possible output message
      Returns:
      String : valid value from input

    • checkExistingName

      public static java.lang.Boolean checkExistingName​(java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Player> playerList, java.lang.String name)
      Method to check if the name selected by the client is already taken
      Parameters:
      playerList - : CopyOnWriteArrayList
      name - : String the name that the client wants
      Returns:
      Boolean (False: the name is already taken, True: the name is ok)

      public static void printPlayerInfo​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, java.lang.Boolean printPawns)
      Method that prints the info related to the players in the game (Name, Color, God Name, God Power, Pawns)
      Parameters:
      players - : type Player[] array containing the players in the game
      printPawns - : type Boolean - true if you want to print the positions of the pawns

    • waitForBuildCommand

      public static java.lang.Boolean waitForBuildCommand​(Game game, Pawn pawn, java.lang.Boolean canBuildDome, java.lang.Boolean allowEsc)
      Method that waits the player's input in the build phase
      Parameters:
      game - : Game
      pawn - : Pawn active pawn
      canBuildDome - : Boolean true= if the player can build a special dome
      allowEsc - : Boolean true= if this wait is a non mandatory build
      Returns:
      Boolean

    • waitForMoveCommand

      public static java.lang.Boolean waitForMoveCommand​(Game game, Pawn pawn, java.lang.Boolean allowSwitch, java.lang.Boolean allowEsc)
      Method that waits the player's input in the move phase
      Parameters:
      game - : Game
      pawn - : Pawn active pawn
      allowSwitch - : Boolean true= if the player can switch his pawn with another pawn (Apollo's power)
      allowEsc - : Boolean true= if this wait is a non mandatory move
      Returns:
      Boolean
